features: 🥰Educational Toys - Including interesting five-pointed star, cute pig and baby mirror Toy, enhance baby's tactile hearing and hand-eye coordination, it can attract the attention and develop learning ability.

💖 Parent-Child Interaction - This hanging toys designed with baby mirror toy, ring bell and BB squeaker functions. Perfect for you to interact with baby, they will be attracted and have fun playing with the cute car seat toys in anywhere, free yourself to do some affairs.

👶 100% Safety Baby Toys - Our stroller toys for babies have passed CPSIA & ASTM F963 certification in the US. 100% safe material. Non-toxic, BPA-free, and suitable for baby's hand feeling. More important things are close to the baby's skin, safe in mouth, and safe for teething babies.

👍MULTI-USE DETACHABLE HANGING TOYS - The 3 soft plush toys can be rearranged, detached and used individually. You can easily hanging them on the car seat, baby carrier, stroller bar, crib, shopping carts, bassinet, play gym so that the baby can play with them at all times and anywhere. The funny shapes encourage the baby's touch and feel.

🎁GREAT GIFT IDEA FOR BABY - Our baby spiral activity toy with a cute pink piggy design is the best choice for every mom-to-be, also an excellent gift choice for Baby showers, Children’s Day, Birthdays, Thanksgiving, Christmas, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my 3 month old
reviews.reviewText: The price is perfect for this simple, yet efficient toy/activity. My 3 month old enjoys the softness and noises that it makes! It catches his eye perfectly and stays up (stable) as it should, but easy to move around too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really impressed with the quality of this toy, my daughter loves it. It is super easy to clean and she loves the little mirror on it to look at herself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Black and White Baby Spiral Hanging toy
reviews.reviewText: This is the sweetest toy. The black and white contrast is perfect for the little ones to see and want to try to grab onto. It has a gentle jingle sound to attract their attention too. Easily attaches to car seats or strollers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s great stimulation for baby.
reviews.reviewText: My baby loves this toy. If you’re debating, GET IT!! I can’t leave the house without it on his car seat now or it’s a very long car ride anytime we leave home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good, not Great
reviews.reviewText: We bought this for our newborn- 5 month old. It dangles very long and is very much in her face. We like it for things like running into the grocery store and it also has deterred people from looking in and wanting to ogle at the baby. I wish it was a little shorter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute But Not Great
reviews.reviewText: This is cute, seems to be good quality and high contrast, but the top doesn’t stay elongated so all three dangle toys end up grouped together. It curls around the car seat handle well and came with a little Velcro strap to make sure baby can’t rip it off. This would be 5 stars if the curled part was made with soke sort of structure to stay spread out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars She loves it!
reviews.reviewText: Babies love the black and white colors. She talks non stop to her toy on her car seat. Makes travel so easy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use anywhere
reviews.reviewText: My baby loves this toy! I’ve hung it on many different things, not just the car seat and stroller. Super soft and fun toys.
My son loves this toy, it attaches to his play gym or his car seat. It’s very cute.

This is a great gift idea! Three months old babies enjoy looking at black-and-white patterns. It makes sense that they didn’t make the stroller hanging toy in different colors because newborns' color perception is limited to white, black and shades of grey. Their eyes and capacity for sight are not fully developed at birth. As a result, babies love to look at high-contrast black-and-white patterns, which stand out in their blurry worlds, attracting their attention and helping them focus. This hanging stroller toy will help babies develop their optic nerves, encourage cognitive development, without feeling over-stimulated. The toy arrived in a small box, which makes it easier to gift wrap it.

These are very cute and are easy to set up on a stroller or bassinet. The rattling toys aren't too loud but still provide some sensory interaction. To wash I've thrown in washer and dryer both on low temp, delicate settings and I've had no issue. Great product!

reviews.reviewTitle: Hanging black and white toys for stroller or crib
reviews.reviewText: This coiled black and white hanging toy is ideal for visual development of newborns and young infants, drawing their attention with the bold black and white colours. The toy is easy to wash. The coil structure is also easy to hang on car seat or stroller handles, or slip through the rungs of a crib without fear of the toys falling on the baby. So far, I have not experienced any drawbacks to this toy.Pros:- Black and white colouring is ideal for visual development of newborns and young infants- Easy to wash- Coil structure makes hanging on a stroller/car seat handle very easy and unlikely to fall on the babyCons:- None so far
